title: Structural regulation-induced Li-electron disentanglement for stabilized oxygen redox of Li-excess disordered rock-salt cathode materials
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00638K, Communication
Sichen Jiao, Yujian Sun, Dekai Shi, Yuanpeng Zhang, Xuelong Wang, Jue Liu, Le Kang, Fangwei Wang, Xiqian Yu, Hong Li, Liquan Chen, Xuejie Huang
Since the discovery of its electrochemical activity, Li-excess disordered rock-salt (DRX) cathode material has received worldwide attention as it sets up a new way to exploit oxygen redox beyond the...
